Player History
Drafted in 43rd round, 681st overall pick, by Philadelphia in 2015...
Injured on 4/1/2015 with a Sore Back, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 5/29/2015 with a Inflamed Anterior Cruciate Ligament, out for 5 weeks...
Injured on 7/16/2015 with a Dislocated Finger, out for one week...
Injured on 8/18/2015 with a Bruised Foot, out for 4 days...
Injured on 4/1/2016 with a Bruised Heel, out for 6 days...
Injured on 6/14/2016 with a Strained Thigh Muscle, out for one week...
Injured on 5/17/2018 with a Strained Thigh Muscle, out for one week...
Released by Philadelphia on 6/20/2019...
Signed as a free agent by St. Louis (C) on 6/25/2019 to a minor league deal...
Had first career hit (triple) on 7/4/2019, off Wendell Cox (COL)...
Was claimed off waivers by Houston on 4/7/2020.
1/31/2021: Gets a new one-year contract worth $550,000 through salary arbitration...
Hit first career homerun on 4/1/2021, off Ray Becnel (SEA)...
